Class Relationship

java.lang.Object
at.tugraz.ist.ase.fm.core.AbstractRelationship
Direct Known Subclasses:
BasicRelationship, ThreeCNFConstraint
public class Relationship extends Object
Represents a relationship/constraint of a feature model.
